pr_title: Improve logging when FlakyTestRetryAnalyzer not enabled

timeline.message: Improve logging when FlakyTestRetryAnalyzer not enabled

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer to keep this method. You might want to move logging here.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
i inlined the method becaause flow logging is generally handled by the caller.
i would end up logging twice when it's disabled
replies.author: findepi
